description:
Epic scale Warhound Titans painted in the colours of Legio Krytos grace the blog today and Garfy talks about how he's found it difficult to fit them into his collection. He also shares his painting guide for Legio Krytos.

The post Showcase: Legions Imperialis Warhound Titans (inc. painting guide) appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: Showcase: Legions Imperialis Warhound Titans (inc. painting guide)
